snippet.title: [PREVIEW] PS2 - Angel Profile (HD, 60FPS)
snippet.description:
This is first 15 minutes of Angel Profile for Playstation 2.

If you like and enjoy our video you can buy us a coffee.
https://ko-fi.com/kawaiigames
DONATIONS: https://streamlabs.com/kawaiigamesie

Angel Profile is a game similar to the princess Maker series, but in this case the main character is not a girl, is a boy. The player in the game takes the role of the boy's father, and decide the education and the different trainings that he will have to do to raise, but as in the real life the decisions will make an evil or a good presence to influence the child. There are different events that will happen during the game and also rivals in possible love stories.

The player can decide what the boy is going to do in each month, he can train about fighting, cooking, music, magic, art, manners, etc. Depending of his trainings he will grow in a way or another. Before each schedule the player can change the boys clothes, go to the shops to buy him new items, talk to the boy or to the evil and the good counselor, etc. There are some times when some events will happen and also some times when the counselor will try to guide to boy to his way of thinking and you have to choose which one he will have to choose.

Also as in the princess maker series the player instead or make the boy to train he can also make him do different jobs (in a church, in a mansion, etc.) to make money, or make him to go to different places to rest or stay at home to rest.

The game features unlockables Card, Event & Ending galleries.
(Source: PsxDataCenter)

Angel Profile
Developer: GeneX
Publisher:  CyberFront
Platform: Playstation 2, PS2
Release: 24 September 2007

Follow KAWAII GAMES here:
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/kawaiigamesie
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/3vYPZRt
DLive: https://dlive.tv/KawaiiGames
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/thekawaiigames/
